Sungbin

Korean: 성빈

Country:

South Korea

Full name:
Lee Sungbin
Native name:
이성빈
Group (2018-2021):
YPDA

Introduction

Sungbin (성빈) was a South Korean singer, member of the girl group YPDA. She joined the group in 2018, after all the original members left.

Current state:
inactive
